Title: The Hormone-iums
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux, Mike Benner (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Tina gets her wish for Wagstaff fame, but soon regrets it. Linda pursues an improbable business venture, but struggles to get it off the ground.
